# SFCustomLanguageModelData.CustomPronunciation

**Structure**

A term to be introduced into the speech recognition model’s vocabulary.

## Declaration

```swift
struct CustomPronunciation
```

## Overview

Attempts to add terms that are already in the model’s vocabulary will be ignored. Pronunciations that use X-SAMPA symbols that are not supported will be ignored; see [doc://com.apple.speech/documentation/Speech/SFCustomLanguageModelData/supportedPhonemes(locale:)] for the set of supported symbols.

## Creating a term

- **init(grapheme:phonemes:)**

## Inspecting a term

- **grapheme**: The written representation of the term, the way it is expected to appear in transcriptions.
- **phonemes**: Zero or more phonetic representations of the term, given as X-SAMPA strings.

## Adding terms

- **insert(term:)**: Add a custom term to the vocabulary.
- **supportedPhonemes(locale:)**: List the supported subset of X-SAMPA pronunciations supported by this locale for the Speech framework.

## Conforms To

- CustomStringConvertible
- DataInsertable
- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
